verbose_text: In mice, TLR9 mediated production of IFNs is abrogated in cells deficient in osteopontin (Opn) and TRAF3, whereas the production of IL-12 unaffected, suggesting that Opn and TRAF3 are involved in the signaling pathway that mediates TLR9 induced activation of type I IFN production [XREF_FIG,].
evidence: TLR9-induced activation of type I IFN
